Reviews.Title: Nice kit...mostly low end componnents
Reviews.Author: Salt Lick "Skeptic"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the battery and the charger thinking that the 'extras' were just a bonus...but fluid arrived partially opened, so everything was greasy...not always a good way to start with a battery/charger.Other items were either unusable or so cheap that they werent worth saving, so we tossed all but the battery, the charger and the little alien leg-tripod.

Reviews.Title: Charger Works.
Reviews.Author: Paul akinjo
Reviews.Content: The two most important components that I needed are there; the Battery and the Charger, the rest of the accessories are nice but not of high importance. Charger works!!!!!
